settings.title: Settings
settings.share: Share a link to your map

filters.noResultsMessage: There are not projects that match with filter criteria.

layers.title: Adjust layers to see detailed data
layers.label: Label

header.settings: Click here to select the funding type
header.basemap: Click here to select the basemap
header.share: Click here to share a link to this dashboard, including applied filters
header.print: Click here to create a PDF image of this map
header.export: Click here to export map data
header.save: Click here to save this map
header.filter: Click here to apply filters to the data in the map and charts

help.stats: This displays the total number and funding of projects with locations, and of national-level projects

fundingtab.fundingtype: Select one or more funding type from the list (OR conditional between them)
fundingtab.financinginstitution: Select one or more financing institution from the list (OR conditional between them)
fundingtab.fundingclassification: Select one or more funding classification from the list (OR conditional between them)

agencytab.fundingagency: Select one or more implementing agency from the list (OR conditional between them)

sectortab.sector: Select one or more sectors from the list (OR conditional between them)
sectortab.relevanceclimate: Select one or more relevance to climate from the list (OR conditional between them)
sectortab.gender: Select one or more gender from the list (OR conditional between them)

datetab.implementperiodstart: Select a range of dates (from - to) for the implementation start date
datetab.implementperiodend: Select a range of dates (from - to) for the implementation end date
datetab.validityperiodstart: Select a range of dates (from - to) for the loan/grant validity start date
datetab.validityperiodend: Select a range of dates (from - to) for the loan/grant validity end date

statustab.financingstatus: Select one or more financing status from the list (OR conditional between them)

financialtab.financialamount: Move from left to right or right to left to select the desired Financial Amount range

physicaltab.physicalprogress: Move from left to right or right to left to select the Percentage of Target Reached range
physicaltab.physicalstatus: Select one or more physical status from the list (OR conditional between them)

filters.reset: Click reset to change or search for new information.
filters.cancel: Click cancel if you wish not to continue searching for an information
filters.apply: Hit the apply button if all desired information are displayed
filters.search: Click search after typing desired information
filters.go: Click Go after typing the information in the search bar

toolview.toolviewtab: Click here to search for projects or change the map layers
toolview.projectsearch: Search for a project title here
toolview.layerscontrol: Select Region, Province, or Municipality level to view in map
toolview.geophotos: This layer includes photos of implementation progress at project locations

chartview.chartviewtab: Click here to view charts showing overall data
chartview.projectcount: View charts using count of projects
chartview.financinginstitution: This chart shows the largest financing institutions (donors) for all locations
chartview.implementingagency: This chart shows the largest implementing agencies for all locations
chartview.physicalstatus: This chart shows a summary of projects by physical status (e.g. on schedule, ahead of schedule, delayed) for all locations
chartview.sector: This chart shows the largest sectors for all locations
chartview.fundingType: This chart shows the funding types for all locations

infowindow.financinginstitution: This chart shows the largest financing institutions (donors) for this location
infowindow.implementingagency: This chart shows the largest implementing agencies for this location
infowindow.physicalstatus: This chart shows a summary of projects by physical status (e.g. on schedule, ahead of schedule, delayed) for this location
infowindow.sector: This chart shows the largest sectors for this location
infowindow.fundingType: This chart shows the funding type for this location
infowindow.projectlist: View a list of all projects matching the applied filters in this location

help.legends: Click here to show map legends

projectsearch.selectall: Select all projects retrieved in the Project List according to the text entered above
projectsearch.apply: Apply the Project Title filter to the map. If you have applied a filter in the Filter window, both filters Projects + Filters will be applied
projectsearch.clearall: Deselect all projects from the project list

about.phrase1: This beta version of the Project and Programs Information Exchange System (PPIES) Open Map website is the output of a USAID technical assistance to NEDA called the Higher Education Solutions Network with Development Gateway as implementing partner under the AidData Center for Development Policy. The Project aimed to develop an online mapping tool which displays the distribution and impact of donor assistance to government programs and projects. It allows mapping or visualization of gaps that need to be addressed in future programming, particularly on how and where to focus future development interventions in the country.
about.phrase2: The Project started implementation in April 2016, and the beta version of the website was launched in September 2016. Parallel to this, in January 2016, the NEDA engaged the services of a consulting firm for the enhancement of the PPIES, which is the central online database system of NEDA on monitoring proposed and ongoing major projects and programs of the Philippine Government. The final version of this website is envisioned to be linked with the enhanced PPIES to serve as the latter systemâ€™s mapping tool.
about.phrase3: The beta version of the website shows information on proposed and ongoing major ODA- and locally-funded programs and projects of the Philippine Government as of year-end 2015, including those completed in 2015. The source of information were the government implementing agencies and bilateral and multilateral development partners of the Philippine Government. The information were gathered from the regular monitoring activities of the NEDA Monitoring and Evaluation Staff (for ongoing projects and programs) and the NEDA Public Investment Staff (for proposed projects and programs).
